messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Yes, it is. I'm on 29, heading back towards Fosters, and I just saw a car driving down the wrong lane.
Okay, are you heading towards Fosters now?
Yes, but I've turned around to catch up with him and see what's going on.
Were you heading towards Winsburg initially?
I'm heading back towards Ruffberg now. He's still in the wrong lane. I'm going southbound, and he's in the northbound lane heading south.
Do you know where he is right now?
I turned around and am heading back down towards Apple Market. Let me see if I can catch up to him.
Oh no, he almost hit someone! He's going south in the northbound lane!
Okay, I need you to be careful. Can you see any landmarks or where he's currently driving?
Yes, I see Bambino's restaurant. He just passed it and he's still in the wrong lane. I'm flying, doing 70, to catch up.
Alright, so you see him now passing the truck stop?
Yes, I see him passing the truck stop. I'm keeping an eye on my speed too. He's really speeding.
Okay, and where are you now?
At Browns Market at Brownsville Road. He's still in the wrong lane.
Alright, so he's going southbound in the northbound lane?
Yes, we're near the Exxon and Bridgeview Market now, and he's still in the wrong lane.
He's in a dark car, four-door, and he's speeding. We're almost at Kelly's store and he's still in the wrong lane.
You're approaching Kelly's Market now?
Yes, and he's still in the wrong lane, heading towards Vanville.
What kind of vehicle are you in?
I'm in a green Trailblazer and traffic is just getting out of the way. I'm doing about 60 now.
Okay, thank you. And where exactly are you now?
We're coming up on Marysville Road. He has a broken brake light on the driver's side.
So you're near Dearborn Road now?
Yes, we're passing Dearborn Road. He must be drunk. He's all over the road.
Okay, please be careful. Where are you now?
We're passing Marysville Road. He's still in the wrong lane, and there's a lot of traffic.
I have officers on the way. Can you provide more landmarks or locations?
We're at Tenial Baptist Church now. I'm trying to flag people down with my lights so they see this driver.
You're at Tenial Baptist now?
Yes, we're passing it now. He's still in the wrong lane, and it's getting dangerous.
Okay, are you still behind him?
Yes, we're coming up on Perkins restaurant now. He's slowing down a bit but still switching lanes.
Can you see any police officers yet?
Not yet. We're at the Perkins restaurant now and about to hit a stretch where I might lose sight of him.
I've got officers running codes. They are on the way.
Alright, we're heading towards Vista Motors now. He's still speeding up and slowing down.
Do not put yourself in danger. Are you still able to keep an eye on him?
Yes, but we're approaching the bridge and he's speeding up again. I'm at 75 now. He's flying.
Please don't endanger yourself. Can you see any officers nearby?
Yes, I see a police on the bridge! He hit his brakes. The officer needs to come down.
Do you see the officer coming down now?
Yes, he's coming down the bridge now. The driver is slowing down and might be taking an exit.
Where is he now?
He's taking the next exit. I see blue lights flashing in his rear windshield.
Alright, thank you for that information. Stay on the line. Where are the officers now?
They're turning around to follow him. I'll try to keep an eye on him from here.
Thank you for your help. Please continue to be safe and let the officers handle it.
Alright, I'll keep my distance now. I hope they catch him.
